text: DIGI Group, also called Digi Communications N.V., is a Romanian telecommunications company. It operates in Romania, Italy, Spain, Portugal, and Belgium. The company is officially based in the Netherlands, but its main office is in Romania. Digi was founded by a Hungarian businessman, Zoltán Teszári. == Subsidiaries == === Current Subsidiaries === * Digi Belgium * Digi Romania * Digi Spain * Digi Italy * Digi Portugal === Former Subsidiaries === * Digi Hungary * Digi Serbia * Digi Slovakia * Digi Croatia * Digi Czech Republic == Notes == Category:Mobile phone companies Category:Telecommunications
title: Digi Group
